title: Cyber Range-Based Training Program for Novice Cybersecurity Professionals

context.additional_context: Stepwise practical learning environment with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Through scenario-based CRX training, over 80% of learners can identify and respond to network intrusion incidents.
Step-by-step CRX training enables learners to explain complex security concepts with over 90% comprehension.
In team-based CRX performance assessments, over 75% of learners demonstrate collaborative problem-solving skills.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
